ftplib::FTP

ftplib::FTP Class Reference

This class tries to imitate the ftplib.FTP python class, with a few differences. Before I write the whole documentation try to adapt yourself to these differences intuitively. See the python documentation. More...

Detailed Description

This class tries to imitate the ftplib.FTP python class, with a few differences. Before I write the whole documentation try to adapt yourself to these differences intuitively. See the python documentation.
